name: __ECommonUserOnlineContext
doc: Enum specifying where and how to run online queries

Game: Called from game code, this uses the default system but with special handling that could merge results from multiple contexts
Default: The default engine online system, this will always exist and will be the same as either Service or Platform
Service: Explicitly ask for the external service, which may not exist
ServiceOrDefault: Looks for external service first, then falls back to default
Platform: Explicitly ask for the platform system, which may not exist
PlatformOrDefault: Looks for platform system first, then falls back to default
